apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple with heart emoji features a man with a deep, dark complexion and a woman with a warm, medium skin tone, their embrace highlighted by a bright, luminous heart. Apple's expert use of smooth gradients and realistic lighting gives the pair a soft, affectionate appearance, embodying the joy and tenderness of a loving relationship. The central heart, rendered with Appleâ€™s signature glossy finish, amplifies the emoji's message of romance and partnership.
